credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Restaurant Florent:  Food Cycle/ Five Stages
description: The design comprises a field of grazing cows in the lower half, against a background of farm buildings and sky filled with cumulus clouds. Five pictographic squares, outlined in black and featuring a sequence of sun, raincloud, grass, a cow and the words, Restaurant Florent, are placed on a circle composed of dashes and arrows. The arrows point in a clockwise direction from one pictogram to the next, describing a food cycle. At the top of the page is the restaurant's address and other pertinent information.
name: advertisement
